Package com.password4j

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HashingFunction
    This interface declares the basic methods that all the Cryptographic Hashing Functions (CHF) must have.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHashingFunction  
    AlgorithmFinder
    This utility class finds algorithms with their configuration based on the environment.
    BCryptFunction  
    CompressedPBKDF2Function  
    Hash
    This class contains all the information computed after calculating a cryptographic hash.
    HashBuilder<H extends HashBuilder<?>>  
    HashChecker<C extends HashChecker<?>>  
    Password  
    PBKDF2Function  
    PepperGenerator
    This class contains static functions that help to create a secure pepper.
    SaltGenerator
    This class contains static functions that help to create a secure salt.
    SCryptFunction  
    SystemChecker  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PBKDF2Function.Algorithm  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadParametersException
    This exception is normally thrown when a not well formed parameter is passed as argument to a function.
